wordpressPost.title: More steampunk
wordpressPost.content: Today the lovely darkness fora blessed me with means to procuring some very nice steampunk links. There was Steampunk – the new steampunk magazine, Brass Goggles – a very nice and frequently updated blog aobut this stuff and The Modern Compendum of Miniature Automata – which I can't quite describe, but you should check it out because it's fun.
